snippet: Mitsui and the Mitsubishi Corporation have agreed to buy a combined 14.7 percent stake in an Australian liquefied natural gas project for $2 billion, the latest transaction in the fast-expanding global energy sector.
abstract: Mitsui and the Mitsubishi Corporation have agreed to buy a combined 14.7 percent stake in an Australian liquefied natural gas project for $2 billion, the latest transaction in the fast-expanding global energy sector.

headline.main: Mitsubishi and Mitsui to Acquire a $2 Billion Stake in Natural Gas Project
